text: Brett was in good communication .. Gave us information before we arrived.  His place is as pictured. It is clean, comfortable , quiet, and in a nice neighborhood. We appreciated that our dog was welcome. The bed was comfortable; nice shower and towels. The kitchen has just what is needed. We would recommend this place . Just remember there are two flights of stairs to climb...
title: Walk/Bike to ACL, 6th St, UT Campus
